channel.title: Compiling error? and warning?
channel.description:
Hey guys, i just found some cool things i'd like to add into my server.
But there's a few problems.
[b]1.[/b] i added a few commands, such as "::whip" and "::gmaul" using the spawn command maker at rune locus. (i'm not a java coder.. lol), and whenever i compile my server... i get this: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- client.java:12958: cannot find symbol symbol : variable command location: class client if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("::whip") && playerRights >= 0) { ^ client.java:12963: cannot find symbol symbol : variable command location: class client if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("::gmaul") && playerRights >= 0) { ^ stream.java:232: warning: [deprecation] getBytes(int,int,byte[],int) in java.lan g.String has been deprecated s.getBytes(0, s.length(), buffer, currentOffset); ^ 2 errors 1 warning Press any key to continue . . . -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- the 2 errors are what im primarily worried about, and the code i inserted for them looked something like this...: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("::gmaul") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(4153, 5); sendMessage(""); }
and... for the whip...:
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("::whip") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(4152, 5); sendMessage(""); } -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- The problem is also the fact that if i got this fixed, on my server console it would say something about not being able to find a specified path non existant on my computer and looking for a file that is there.. so if i could also be enlighted on how to change what path it searches for, i'd appreciate it.
[b]2.[/b]I personnaly enjoy the massable g maul special attack. So, i found someone with the code for a massable one, and have it saved to my desktop. Just wondering if anyone could tell me where i put the special code for the g maul.
Well, that about covers my errors..
I appreciate anyone that can help me with anything of this sort.
Thanks, Void Knight.

item.title: Compiling error? and warning?
item.dc:creator: @Void_Knight1 Void Knight
item.description:
@Void_Knight1 wrote:

No magic Ranger it said it already existed and i was duplicating, plus the custom item was already defined earlier.

Thanks Owner, ill try it.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2008, 07:23:42 PM[/size][hr]one problem owner, i dont have that command yet, lol just started, and so i dont know where i should place it.

Could you please tell me? thanks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2008, 07:42:52 PM[/size][hr]Also Wondering where i’d go about inserting this special attack? (what file, where, line, or something of the sort)

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2008, 07:43:41 PM[/size][hr]public void GMAULSpecial()
{
if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4154 && SpecialDelay >= 4)
{
staticAnimation(337, absX, absY, 0);
setAnimation(1667);
actionTimer = 756767;
SpecDamgNPC(25);
GMAULDamg = true;
GMAULtimer = 1;
AnimationReset = true;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
sendMessage(“You smash the enemy twice.”);
SpecialDelay -= 2;
} else
if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4154 && SpecialDelay >= 4 && (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy || PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy2) || (duelStatus == 3))
{
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
SpecDamg(25);
GMAULDamg = true;
GMAULtimer = 1;
staticAnimation(337, absX, absY, 0);
startAnimation(1667);
actionTimer = 756767;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
sendMessage(“You smash the enemy twice.”);
} else
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4154 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && !GMAUL)
GMAUL = true;
else
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4154 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && GMAUL)
GMAUL = false;
else {
sendMessage(“You dont have enough power.”); }
getFilling();
}

It would be highly appreciated

Read full topic

item.description:
@Owner_Jp wrote:

Ok do this… Search for (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")

Then under the last } add you’re command, like this:

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Musicmad441 } else { teleportToX = 2662; teleportToY = 3307; sendMessage("You teleport to Home."); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("gmaul") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(4153, 5); sendMessage("Here's You're Gmaul. Have fun, Play nice!"); } [br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2008, 07:18:33 PM[/size][hr]That help any? o.O Im pretty good at coding… So that SHOULD work.

item.title: Compiling error? and warning?
item.dc:creator: @R4NG3R_9 R4NG3R 9
item.description:
@R4NG3R_9 wrote:

oh btw i hope this fixes warning

    public void writeString(java.lang.String s) {
        s.getBytes(0, s.length(), buffer, currentOffset);
        currentOffset += s.length();
        buffer[currentOffset++] = 10;
    }

in your stream.java search for

s.getBytes(0, s.length(), buffer, currentOffset);

and change anything you see different with yours to mine

remember to back upp Im learning still lol
hope i help

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling error? and warning?
item.dc:creator: @Void_Knight1 Void Knight
item.description:
@Void_Knight1 wrote:

Hey guys, i just found some cool things i’d like to add into my server.

But there’s a few problems.

1. i added a few commands, such as “::whip” and “::gmaul” using the spawn command maker at rune locus. (i’m not a java coder… lol), and whenever i compile my server… i get this:

client.java:12958: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable command
location: class client
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("::whip") && playerRights >= 0) {
^
client.java:12963: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable command
location: class client
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("::gmaul") && playerRights >= 0) {
^
stream.java:232: warning: [deprecation] getBytes(int,int,byte[],int) in java.lan
g.String has been deprecated
s.getBytes(0, s.length(), buffer, currentOffset);
^
2 errors
1 warning
Press any key to continue . . .

the 2 errors are what im primarily worried about, and the code i inserted for them looked something like this…:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("::gmaul") && playerRights >= 0) {
addItem(4153, 5);
sendMessage("");
}

and… for the whip…:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("::whip") && playerRights >= 0) {
addItem(4152, 5);
sendMessage("");
}

The problem is also the fact that if i got this fixed, on my server console it would say something about not being able to find a specified path non existant on my computer and looking for a file that is there… so if i could also be enlighted on how to change what path it searches for, i’d appreciate it.

2.I personnaly enjoy the massable g maul special attack. So, i found someone with the code for a massable one, and have it saved to my desktop. Just wondering if anyone could tell me where i put the special code for the g maul.

Well, that about covers my errors…

I appreciate anyone that can help me with anything of this sort.

Thanks,
Void Knight.

Read full topic
